job_tasks.phrase: You'll be responsible for how customers get into contact with the bank on a large scale, working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the responsibility of working on and maintaining an application landscape that handles a large volume of customer interactions, which is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to improving a voicebot using both traditional NLP and Generative AI features, which falls under model development and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
job_tasks.justification: Participating in technical discussions and providing input/advice is a collaborative software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities;
job_tasks.justification: Test automation and management are crucial parts of the software development lifecycle and operations, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: You ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on code quality and architecture is a fundamental software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, the mention of 'Generative AI-based features' in the context of improving a voicebot implies the use and potential refinement of these features, which can include prompt engineering or leveraging pre-trained models.

soft_skills.phrase: The end-user is always number one! In the back of your head, you're always keeping this in mind. You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
soft_skills.justification: This phrase emphasizes a focus on the end-user and achieving business objectives, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us. You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques;
soft_skills.justification: This clearly indicates a desire to learn and experiment with new technologies, fitting the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions. You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
soft_skills.justification: This highlights collaboration with various team members and active participation in technical discussions, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: You have fun in everything you do!
soft_skills.justification: While not a direct indicator of innovation or ownership, having fun in one's work often correlates with engagement and a proactive approach, which can foster innovation. However, this is a weaker signal compared to others.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes improving a voicebot using both traditional NLP and Generative AI features (1.B.1), indicating a focus on GenAI. It also involves working on an application landscape (1.A.1), participating in technical discussions (1.A.1), test automation (1.A.2), and ensuring code quality/architecture (1.A.1). The technologies listed, such as MS Power Virtual Agents and Copilot Studio, are specific to conversational AI and GenAI. The role requires a balance of developing AI features and integrating them into a larger system, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly mentions Generative AI features and specific tools like Copilot Studio, indicating a GenAI focus. It also outlines core software engineering responsibilities like working on an application landscape, code quality, and team collaboration. The mix of AI-specific tasks and general software engineering tasks makes the profile assignment relatively clear. However, the depth of 'Generative AI-based features' is not fully detailed, preventing a perfect score.
